item.title: Need fast help!
item.dc:creator: @imukaszz imukaszz
item.description:
@imukaszz wrote:

kk how i can make sara brew give like super defence pot def up like 18lvls
case 6685:
if (System.currentTimeMillis() -c.potionDelay < 2000)
return;
c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
c.potionDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();

if(c.playerLevel[0] >= 10 && c.playerLevel[1] >= 10 && c.playerLevel[2] >= 10 && c.playerLevel[3] >= 10 && c.playerLevel[4] >= 10 && c.playerLevel[5] >= 10){
c.setAnimation(0x33D);
c.sM(“You drink some of the foul liquid.”);
c.sM(“You have 3 doses of potion left.”);
c.deleteItem(6685, slot, 1);
c.addItem(6687, 1);
c.currentHealth += 20;
c.playerLevel[0] -= 5;
c.playerLevel[2] -= 5;
c.playerLevel[4] -= 5;
c.playerLevel[6] -= 5;
} else {
c.sM(“You Are to weak to do this.”);

}
